Name: The White Glove and the Fisherman
Title: The White Glove and the Fisherman
Desc: "Amongst us, there is our own justice."

Talent.Name: The White Glove and the Fisherman
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K2002]</color> and place it randomly amongst the 5 cards at the top of your deck. If this card has only 1 $[K3] remaining, draw 1 card.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K2002.Name: "Called In For Cleanup"
K2002.Desc: Cost: 0{SPRITE_PRESET#1108}\nYour active character will deal +1 DMG the next time they deal DMG. (Can stack. Max +2)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.
